name: Feature Flags
description: Runtime feature toggles for voice, sensors, fleet tracking, and other capabilities to enable gradual rollout.

prd.problemStatement: Progressive feature rollout and A/B testing require runtime feature control without deployments. Feature flags enable safe, gradual releases.
goals: Provide admin UI for flag management
userStories: As a product manager, I want feature flags so that I can safely roll out new features
As an admin, I want per-tenant flags so that I can customize feature access
